website_summaries.verdict: Versatile casting rod that gives you a good level of performance for the price, regardless of your experience level.
pros: Upgraded from previous models with a lighter weight design that doesn't sacrifice the durability for which this brand is known
Uses a 2-piece design for convenience in storage
Offers a composite fiberglass and graphite construction that will stand up to all kinds of conditions you find on the lake
cons: Finish on the rod seems to wear down fast
Some problems with keeping the 2 pieces together

customer_reviews.title: Toughest rod.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't care too much for this rod when it got home. Didn't like the feeling in my hand, it wasn't the lightest rod neither, but as soon I started using it found that it served well in pretty much all applications. Live baits fishing, trolling, casting, you name it. Caught a 75 pound "Surubí" last weekend and the rod, paired with a Tekota reel, handled like a champ during the 30 minute fight. Only Ugly Sticks for me.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Ortellado

customer_reviews.title: I only buy the best, this rod is the only brand any fisherman ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the rod. My second, first was hand me down. Still have it after 40 yrs. I only buy the best, this rod is the only brand any fisherman should have, I'd put this rod accompanied with my reel against any $1000.00 rig. My cost for both, $88.00 I super highly recommend #UglyStick. The med light to me is very light, sensitive. Had a fly land on the tip, felt him rub his legs together. 😂
customer_reviews.author: Frederick m.

customer_reviews.title: ... that I bought not in a combo and I love it. I had a few cheap combos and ...
customer_reviews.text: My first rod that I bought not in a combo and I love it. I had a few cheap combos and finally got this and paired it with a KastKing Royale Legend and it works great. Going to purchase a spinning setup soon and will get the Ugly Stik GX2 spinning rode!
customer_reviews.author: Juan Rangel

customer_reviews.title: What A Nice Rod...!!!
customer_reviews.text: Received the rod in great packaging no damage and with both pieces. Paired this rod with a Kastking Royale Legend Baitcasting Reel and 30lb. test Kastking Braided Line which is between 10lb. test - 12lb. test mono diameter and I must say I'm very satisfied with the result. This rod has a better reel seat and a slightly larger handle than the 6 foot model but the rod diameter is only slightly larger which makes it just as nimble but stronger plus add 6 inches to it's length. This rod is not a Pro-Level rod but for the serious fisherman it puts us right in the game and I can't wait to hook my next fish, what a nice rod...!!!
customer_reviews.author: TheKeifer

customer_reviews.title: PERFECTLY PRACTICAL PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: What I wanted. The model is updated cosmetics with better guides & reelseat. It's all I'll buy, any type of Ugly Stik. The best "basic" rod everyday leisure fishing. Pick a reel: spincaster, spin, underspin, baitcaster, fly...match it to an Ugly Stik, you have a winner.
customer_reviews.author: Hushabye Shamus

customer_reviews.title: Durable and affordable
customer_reviews.text: After the graphite rod I bought for my oldest kid broke with the lightest snag on a rock (I pulled out the mono line with my soaking wet bare hands quite easily), I bought this Ugly Stick GX2 as a replacement. The action and overall feel of the rod isn't quite as nice, but we no longer have to worry about breaking the rod with a mere two and a half pounds of drag at the sign of the slightest snag, or breaking the rod should we land a larger fish than intended. Additionally, it's can also handle channel catfish which is a nice plus.
customer_reviews.author: Boomstick

customer_reviews.title: Great rod!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I ordered. Medium Heavy. Great for catching fish with a hard mouth, like striped bass in Lake Mead. The color pattern is different at the tip to make it easier to see when a fish is on the line.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Hargrave

customer_reviews.title: It's an Ugly Stik  ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been fishing since I was 8, and now 70+. I have had many rods and reels over that time. Generally speaking, the ugly stik is a great fresh water rod. These newer ones don't seem to feel like my older ones, but are holding up well, so .... we'll see what happens.
customer_reviews.author: wolfinwolfsclothing

customer_reviews.title: Amazing rod for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing rod. I've always ugly sticks were known for thier durability and functionality. I couldn't agree more. I've used this Rod more than a dozen times and caught some good sized fish with it. I usually go for stripers where I'm from and you won't have to worry about it breaking. I pair it with my baitcaster and have never had any problems. It's still as sturdy as the day I bought it. I dunno why they call it "ugly", it's far from it and it looks so bad ass. Great rod for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Vince W

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I've used other ugly stiks and they're great, but this one I got only 3 small fish and on the fight with the 4th fish (a 3.5-4 foot tarpon) the rod broke after 20 minutes of fight it. Lost the lure and the rod which broke. I've been trying to contact customer service to open a warranty dispute and nothing so far.
customer_reviews.author: Saulo Ventura

customer_reviews.title: 6 foot has a really short handle.
customer_reviews.text: I have used these rods in the past and really like the weight and performance of the longer 7 and 7.5 rods. I purchased the 6-foot rods to troll with and was surprised at how short the handles were. The focus of this review is to let others know what to expect. I do not have anything bad to say about the rod itself. I was just not happy with the short handle. I have attached a picture to compare the 6-foot rod (top rod with reel, to the longer rod (just under the 6 footer). I plan on going with the Ugly stick Striper rod instead.
customer_reviews.author: Damon Outdoors

customer_reviews.title: BAD QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: After a summer season of use figured out the reason I was loosing lures. The guide rods developed grooves in them that fraid the line. Very disappointed in this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Butke

customer_reviews.title: This rod is clutch
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to, everyday beater rod. Super durable and reliable, light enough to cast all day. I got the medium heavy for targeting channel cats, and just ordered a medium spinning version for going after bass with lighter lures. The medium heavy works for light tackle but it's not ideal. I pair it with an Abu Garcia ambassadeur 6500C3 for catfish and it fishes like a dream. Sensitivity is great. As long as the line is fairly tight I can feel every little nibble. Great rod for the money.
customer_reviews.author: chasecats

customer_reviews.title: Great Rod for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great rod for the price. I own G Loomis, St. Croix and other high end rods, but my "go-to" rods are always Ugly Sticks. They just seem to last year after year and there are no worries about a $250 rod getting beat up when the kids are in the boat with me. I'll keep buying Ugly Sticks as long as they are made.
customer_reviews.author: Average Joe

customer_reviews.title: I like the rod however the butt section is shorter than ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the rod however the butt section is shorter than I like. I wanted to use it for a cheap slow jigging rod which the action seemed to be good for. The butt section on the medium only goes as far as the middle of my forearm where as the medium heavy extends far enough to be tucked under the armpit like a normal jigging rod. I wish they would make the butt section longer as I think this would be a viable slow jigging rod. Additionally the guides are not very strong and can be bent easily due to the lack of a secondary support. For 40 bucks it is definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Paul M.

customer_reviews.title: Best of the Best
customer_reviews.text: If your in the market for a good rod to use with any bait caster, stop right here. This is awesome, flexible tip and perfect for any top water lure. This is my second one, due to a buddy buying me a new bait caster reel, had to have a rod to match. Very flexible and super good quality for the buck. I highly recommend this rod to all my fellow fishermen
customer_reviews.author: aron austin

customer_reviews.title: Try One, You’re gone to Like it!
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these already and I loved these rods, built to last and they are real performers. Bought two this round and give my grandson one with a new reel for his birthday. He loves it as well and said it feels perfect, just the right balance with plenty of strength. Shakespeare has always made very nice, quality rods and this reminds me of my Wonder Rod, purchased in the 70’s and still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: f.s.study

customer_reviews.title: Should have been two
customer_reviews.text: They was supposed to be two rods in the box but there’s only one? Where’s the other rod?
customer_reviews.author: Larry k. Smith

customer_reviews.title: NOT WHAT I PAID FOR!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. The bag it arrived in was already torn open, as if it had been returned already and not fixed or repackaged. The bottom piece is not the same as what is pictured and the top is a completely different color! I was excited when it arrived because it was just in time for a fishing trip but now I’m completely disappointed in the product and the company. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LumberjackZach

customer_reviews.title: Great fishing rods!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using ugly stik fishing poles for over 20 yrs. I own 7 of them from light to medium-heavy action. I've never had a problem with the quality or workmanship of the poles. If you take care of them they last forever. They make great fishing poles what else can I say.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Overall great rod.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Works well and is of quality construction. Cons: Not as comfortable as some other rods. The handle could be ~3 inches longer for two handed casting As far as the comfort, I only really notice it when I'm walking to the water. For the handle length, it's still very workable. If there were only one of these cons I would have given it a 5 star. I still almost did. My only regret is that I ever bought a nicer rod because otherwise I would not know the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Landis Blackwell

customer_reviews.title: Eyes are too weak for fishing.
customer_reviews.text: The rod seems to be good. However this is my second attempt to order through amazon. The eyes on the rod com smashed for the second time. The first tome the box was crushed. The second time the box was fine but the eyes were still crushed??? So this is happening prior to boxing the rods. If the eyes are the flimsy then they definitely won’t hold up to salt water fishing..
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: Looks a very durable rod as advertised , but guides are really poor , very fragile and can bend very easily, it arrived with all misaligned, the butt piece is quite short below normal, you can only only hold by you are hand no way to rest under your aram , not if this for the size I ordered 6.6 or for all, in my view there is a lot of other better options for the money , wont buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Mohamed Hamza

customer_reviews.title: Good Rod at a decent price
customer_reviews.text: Love the rod when I finally got it. One small hitch when they say it will be there and they ship it the same day not a big deal in the long run but when UPS sends it on a journey from Macon to Tifton to Atlanta to Brunswick to Cairo to Tifton to Brunswick to my neighbor instead of my doorstep. You just have to wonder who is controlling their shipping. But now that i have it it is paired with a cast king speed demon and working fine so far.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous sailor.

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: Not as picture described. Comes with a short pistol grip style handle, not the long handle as in the picture. I'll try to add a photo when I get home. Maybe the different length rods come with different handles. If so, it should be noted. I bought the 5'6" rod.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it !
customer_reviews.text: I love this casting rod, I got the 2piece 7’. I had a different rod and it was too stiff, I checked so many other brands and lengths and same thing, all stuff. I picked up this pole, it was amazing ! I used it all weekend, almost spot on with every cast and the action is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Sagerods

customer_reviews.title: Great rod paired with a KastKing baitcaser
customer_reviews.text: So this was the first time I ever purchased and rod and reel separate. This rod is great. I’m probably going to change the reel on it now that I’m understanding fishing a lot better but the rod itself is really good.
customer_reviews.author: Steven S.

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Came in a box that was practically destroyed in shipping and figured rod would be a total loss. It was fine without any damage which speaks highly of the durability of the rod. Gave to grandson for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: John C

customer_reviews.title: so it's still a good rod but I really wasn't looking for two medium ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 7' medium and it's just as stiff as my 6'6" meadium heavy ugly stick. so it's still a good rod but I really wasn't looking for two medium heavies. Also bought a light ugly stick and it feels the same as another brand medium that I have so I guess these ugly sticks just run stiff.
customer_reviews.author: skittles

customer_reviews.title: The rod is lightweight and super strong. Also
customer_reviews.text: Got it as an anniversary gift from the wife. The rod is lightweight and super strong. Also, it is thinner than the other 20-30 dollar rods say from different brands. The rod is great and extremely responsive to the slightest nibble and tough enough to bring the hard pulling catfish. This rod also grabs the attention of others fishing close by and complement the look of the rod. Overall the rod is awesome and I enjoy it .

customer_reviews.title: I wouldny reccomend it. Snapped in half on the very first trip
customer_reviews.text: I paired this product with a daiwa BG 4500 used it for the very first time yesterday.. taught i would order a medium-heavy duty one since my smaller one was tough. Upon fishing with it my rod snapped in half with very light pulling done to it. Everyone in the boat laughed at me since i was over confident i had the best gear. I wouldnt reccomend it. It isnt flexible its too stiff and as it flexed a little it cracked. The smaller one i have is far better than this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy!!!! But a solid rod!
customer_reviews.text: Got the product yesterday, and I def was with the quality of the rod, nice and solid. Looks nice with my KastKing Spartacus. My only complaint is the rod is pretty damn heavy! I compared it with my other rod, and wow what a difference. Haven’t used it yet, but will be this weekend. If it doesn’t go well, I will update my review, but I have a pretty good feeling I’m gonna love it!
customer_reviews.author: GBrouillette

customer_reviews.title: good starter rod
customer_reviews.text: This is my first baitcasting setup so take this with a grain of salt i have it paired with an abu-garcia silver max I will admit its not the most sensitive rod being a two piece and mostly fiberglass but it is damn strong. This action has worked well for me with jigs crank baits fishing with bait for scup and small blues; this rod would fit perfectly into any rod lineup as a travel rod or as a starter rod for anyone getting into fising. Pros -cheap -strong -light cons -not very sensitive thats it really for cons
customer_reviews.author: kevin dasilva

customer_reviews.title: Haven't hooked any fish yet as I continue to fine tune use of a bait caster
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, seems strong and smooth. Haven't hooked any fish yet as I continue to fine tune use of a bait caster. I have this set up with a KastKing Stealth and 20 lb braid. Seems to be a good combination tossing up to 1 oz lures from jettys and the shore at the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Rf Foley

customer_reviews.title: They call it the magic stik
customer_reviews.text: Light weight rod and right balance. Since my friend introduced me to this magic stik I never bought any other fishing rod model except ugly stik gx2 medium action. This rod is very sensitive and you can use it to catch bull reds. I’m very satisfied with this product and I always recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Mar C.

customer_reviews.title: Ordered Two!
customer_reviews.text: The sales ad advertised them as one piece rods but i received two piece rods. not a super big deal but overall a good quality rod for catfish.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Limited out on big catfish several times and rods still strong
customer_reviews.text: I don't like how the 7'6" doesn't come in medium action anymore only medium/light. Different then the stiffness of my last gen ugly stiks but getting used to them.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Best Rod.
customer_reviews.text: I am a big fan of Ugly Stick fishing rods. The 2-piece casting rod performs very well fishing in a variety of conditions. I use it fishing around submerged stumps and trees, as well as open water. It provides the strength to bring in large fish and/or work loose from getting hooked by stumps or bushes under water. It is responsive enough that I always know when a fish is striking. I highly recommend this rod.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: UNBELIEVABLE!
customer_reviews.text: This fishin pole is litterally unbreakable, Notbing can break it! If you want a pole that will last forever this is the one. Could use a little breaking in at first to get that whip action. But it's very bueno!
customer_reviews.author: Briston

customer_reviews.title: Great Tough Awesomeness!
customer_reviews.text: Ugly Stick always delivers quality! I have many and even when fighting fish way above their rating they never fail!
customer_reviews.author: Cuban Comanche

customer_reviews.title: It’s an Ugly Stick
customer_reviews.text: I have used Ugly Stik for 20 years. Hard to go wrong for the money. I feel just as armed with this as any much more expensive rod.
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: Great fishing rod
customer_reviews.text: My first ugly stik and I'm loving it. I got the 5'6 model, The handle is a little shorter than the longer ones but i got use to it and love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kait

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Fished with only a coulle times tip already broken. Poorly crafted and highly disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Am happy
customer_reviews.text: It’s a bit thick, but works great for the application. I’m bottom fishing for red snapper with a 4oz weight. I also used it for trolling for kingfish. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: cvargas1

customer_reviews.title: This pole is a lot shorter then I thought it was...
customer_reviews.text: Received just the bottom half of this two piece fishing rod today. I guess someone didn’t think I needed the top half. No fishing this weekend. Very disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: Mark Jacquin

customer_reviews.title: I received the rod in great cardboard packaging and it works well for a low-priced ...
customer_reviews.text: I received the rod in great cardboard packaging and it works well for a low-priced rod. I have several high-priced rods that have the same quality as this does.
customer_reviews.author: Old Techy

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly Ugly!!! In a good way!
customer_reviews.text: Performed just as I hoped. This is my third Ugly Stick, so I think I'm the one hooked! Caught some snapper on it today, just got it yesterday!
customer_reviews.author: David Galloway

customer_reviews.title: The rods are great and perform well
customer_reviews.text: The rods are great and perform well. The rod tips on these poles are made poorly and I have had to replace several of them within a few months of use which is unexpected from the Ugly Stik product line.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J. Tully

customer_reviews.title: Good ole ugly stik
customer_reviews.text: Great new look and handle is a little longer...love the new design and look
customer_reviews.author: Saltydog

customer_reviews.title: Ugly Stick
customer_reviews.text: This ugly stick is perfect for my Zebco Omega Pro spin cast reel. I have used Ugly Sticks in the past and they have held up well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good ol' ugly stick
customer_reviews.text: Good ol' ugly stick. Can't go wrong. Great price. Nice and strong med-heavy action. I like it so much, I ordered another one. Paired it with my Kastking Royale with 30lb KastKing braid.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Brandes

customer_reviews.title: Nothing Ugly about Rods performance.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for daughter-in-law. She will enjoy the durability and excellent casting with this rod.
customer_reviews.author: Prentice Creel

customer_reviews.title: Great Rod.
customer_reviews.text: It's durable and very well built. Don't advise the 6'6" option!
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Shipped half of my pole
customer_reviews.text: Only received half of the pole. Tried calling the 1-800 number provided and it just rings and rings. I have a very disappointed son who was planning on using this for his fishing trip tomorrow
customer_reviews.author: Shivohn Wehling

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Ive taken this out fishing a few times already and it works well pulling jigs through cover and working topwater baits. Havent tried anthing else on it but I am most likely going to be purchasing the Elite series for my other types of baits. Overall you cant go wrong with an ugly stick!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: TOP-NOTCH FISHING ROD
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift to my son and he loves it! After doing much research, I selected this rod because of his great reputation; paired with a Penn Battle II Spinning Reel, 5000. GREAT combination!
customer_reviews.author: lecpo

customer_reviews.title: Only the bottom half of the rod was sent.  Seriously.
customer_reviews.text: The rod is definitely light weight as I only got half of it. Otherwise, it does not work well at all. If and when I get the top half I'll return and update the review.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My husband bought this for me to go fishing with him.
customer_reviews.text: We have enjoyed using this fishing rod going fishing together.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda J Moore-Lott

customer_reviews.title: wife use it
customer_reviews.text: work good for little pole it hand big fish no problem
customer_reviews.author: petertrinh

customer_reviews.title: Was not new as advertised..... terrible
customer_reviews.text: Received the package late and when I opened it I noticed the defects. It was like it was chewed by an animal enough that the bottom was missing and the weight fell out.
customer_reviews.author: nakia

customer_reviews.title: An awesome, tough, sensitive workhorse fishing pole
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievabley tough, yet still sensitive. An absolutely awesome workhorse of a casting rod. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: TJTop Contributor: Fishing

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: The Shipping was awesome, and no damage on the rod. Likewise, it is flexible and very strong. Thank You.
customer_reviews.author: Mojo

customer_reviews.title: Only half of rod?
customer_reviews.text: Only the bottom of the rod was in the box. Sent that back and we will see if the whole thing shows up next time.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: A classic rod well worth the money. This one is designed for baitcasting reels. It is tough but I can still feel the lake bottom while fishing with this rod. Why spend more?
customer_reviews.author: GR0170

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional rod for the money. These rods are almost indestructible.
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional rod for the money. These rods are almost indestructible.
customer_reviews.author: Les Peterson

customer_reviews.title: it will blister your finger!
customer_reviews.text: The finger hook is at an acute angle so that your index finger gets squeezed and rubs a blister after several casts. Otherwise it is a fine rod.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Well made rod, arrived in a few days. Using it with a baitcaster reel I also bought. Caught a 2.5lb largemouth and this rod handled the fight very well, could handle much larger fish no problem. I can finesse a senko to my liking...recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Drinnt

customer_reviews.title: Casts phenomenally!
customer_reviews.text: Tried it yesterday for the first time, casts beautifully! Very easy to pin point and good distance. I'm using the 7' medium action 2 pc.
customer_reviews.author: Racecar Fabricator

customer_reviews.title: My go to rods
customer_reviews.text: Ugly Stik GX2 and the Elite models are my go to rods.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse R.

customer_reviews.title: Nice rod
customer_reviews.text: You can't beat the reliability and durability of an Ugly Stik.
customer_reviews.author: BW

customer_reviews.title: VERY STIFF!
customer_reviews.text: VERY STIFF! Medium/Heavy is like a Super Heavy. Not very sensitive either. Not what I needed for Jigging walleyes.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Update
customer_reviews.text: Update Came on time right rod. Glad I re ordered
customer_reviews.author: Bernadette

customer_reviews.title: Nice feel to it
customer_reviews.text: Caught a few fish with it, no problems detected. Has a nice balanced feel.
customer_reviews.author: Ram

customer_reviews.title: Casting Rod for most bass baits.
customer_reviews.text: I am currently replacing some older pistol grip that are worn out. These are my go to rods and just the right length and type for most of my bass fishing. Packaged well in heavy box and arrived prommptly.
customer_reviews.author: jackc

customer_reviews.title: Very good rod, I have several of them
customer_reviews.text: Very good rod, I have several of them. I am not a pro fisherman, but it seems to work great for me,
customer_reviews.author: TOM B

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: the best rod I have ever use on heavy fish
customer_reviews.author: philip turano

customer_reviews.title: Makes for longer casts.
customer_reviews.text: The tip of this rod really slings the baits. Very sensitive rod, you feel light hits and structure. This is the only rod I use now for bait casting.
customer_reviews.author: David E.

customer_reviews.title: Frustrated Order
customer_reviews.text: This is suppose to be a 2 piece fishing rod and I only receive one piece. I was suppose to take my nephew fishing this weekend and now I need to find a tackle shop last minute, and deal with returning this item. Very frustrating purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Actions pretty good as it could sense a 3in perch nibbling ...
customer_reviews.text: Actions pretty good as it could sense a 3in perch nibbling on it, however can't give it 3 stars as it comes bent. Not bent front or back but to the side. I goes to the left a bit. I returned one because of it, but the new one they sent me had the same issue. Not only that but the finish is not good.
customer_reviews.author: Han

customer_reviews.title: 6' Med action 1 piece
customer_reviews.text: Great rod so far. Good grip. Can cast with one or two hands easily. So far have only been at little ponds and can't wait to try some bigger game fish soon.
customer_reviews.author: Chris C

customer_reviews.title: Overall a pretty nice rod and you would need to spend a bunch of money to find a better one.
customer_reviews.text: The Ugly Stick itself is great, casts well and looks good. A bit of minutae, the flat black finish is a bit uneven but that is hard to notice until the sun is shining right on it. The disapointments are that the box it was shipped in was a disaster waiting to happen, and the rod is made in our favorite Communist country by fine Oriental craftsman. This is my 3rd Ugly Stick, the first was made in the 70s, the second is a Custom made in the 90s.
customer_reviews.author: H. J Wimmer

customer_reviews.title: Good product !
customer_reviews.text: Only fishing pole on the market in my opinion !
customer_reviews.author: Carroll e. Greene

customer_reviews.title: Stiffer than you think.
customer_reviews.text: The medium feels more like a medium heavy. Still working on my baitcasting, but other than that it seems very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: cturboaddict

customer_reviews.title: Great rod
customer_reviews.text: Rod is perfect. Casts far and smooth. Action is perfect. Sensitivity is right on.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Rod is well built like most of Shakespeare products.
customer_reviews.text: This rod is well built, like most of Shakespeare products, and the 1 piece, 7'6", Light/Medium rod that I purchased has great action to help cast lighter tackle farther.
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: Good fishing rod
customer_reviews.text: Arrived undamaged. Works great, as expected. I currently have 5 rod/reel combos. I have a mixture of branded reels (Zebco, Abu, Fleuger, etc) but they are all mounted to ugly sticks.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Gee

customer_reviews.title: Nice rod
customer_reviews.text: Great rod and much easier to maneuver going through the brush.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Vogt

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Best rod for the money. It is very strong and sensitive. It’s on the heavy side but it’s excellent for dead stick
customer_reviews.author: max

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy rod. I've had good luck with Ugly Stiks. I've broken two nearly new other brands this year.
customer_reviews.author: L. Storey

customer_reviews.title: Good, rugged 2 piece fishing rod
customer_reviews.text: I have several of these rods and bought these to give as gifts. I really like UglyStik rods.
customer_reviews.author: GaTechIE

customer_reviews.title: FISHING ROD AND REEL
customer_reviews.text: Used this rod on my last two fishing trips with a bass pro shop reel for Sea Bass, fluke and porgies. It has now become one of my favorite rods.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. Feffer

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: Not the 8 inch handle I ordered. Only had a 3 inch handle. it was very old, the box was covered in DUST.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Davis

customer_reviews.title: Value and Dependability
customer_reviews.text: Can never go wrong with an Ugly Stix. Great value...durable and stands the test of time....came quick and packed nicely and securely
customer_reviews.author: Steve Savage

customer_reviews.title: Good, cheap rod.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality for money. I've noticed quality varies greatly on this product as I've ordered several of these. Some are perfect, some are less than perfect. This time, fortune has smiled and I've received a good one. Happy fishing!
customer_reviews.author: Michael P. Evans

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 5'6" rod and it is not comfortable to cast. The grip has just enough room for my casting hand, very forward weight. Granted, its decent for a short one-piece setup you can throw in your car or what have you but overall not good.
customer_reviews.author: Hayden Purpura

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Great rod I guess...the rod handle broke on the 1st cast..thinking it was delivered or broken in shipping..hoping to see about a replacement 😭
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Montana

customer_reviews.title: Solid rod
customer_reviews.text: Nice rod. Has a nice bend to it. Haven’t used it to its potential yet. Will update if anything changes
customer_reviews.author: Edo Brisku

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner rod
customer_reviews.text: Great casting rod for a beginner. Was light weight and did not have any fatigue issues carrying it around. On top of that, very durable. Unfortunately, didn't catch any trout on my fishing trip :(
customer_reviews.author: Ben Wang

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Spend more money and get a better rod, the action is terrible, and I broke one of the 5 rods I bought the first time out.
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: It's an Ugly Stick
customer_reviews.text: I love them. $$ for $$ the best rod on the market IMHO
customer_reviews.author: Keith Pierson

product_meta.title: Ugly Stik GX2 Casting Rod
product_meta.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS

 * Manufacturer :Pure Fishing
 * ASIN :B00F0KLSCE

feature_bullets: Durable, lightweight fishing rod offers a balanced feel for lighter weight
Virtually indestructible blank construction with a combination of graphite and fiberglass
Clear tip design delivers added responsiveness and strength
Lightweight EVA grips provide comfort during lengthy fishing outings
1 piece stainless steel ugly tuff guides eliminate insert pop out and can be used with all types of line
